publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1984 Elaine Murray: Scottish Cup—That the Parliament congratulates Queen of the South and Rangers football clubs for an exciting Scottish Cup Final on 24 May 2008 and congratulates Rangers on its victory and Queens on its spirited performance, especially in the second half.

S3M-1984 Scottish Cup (lodged on 27 May 2008) Jamie McGrigor*, David Stewart*, Karen Gillon*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Butler*, Murdo Fraser*, Andy Kerr*, George Foulkes*, John Lamont*, Nanette Milne*, Keith Brown*, Bashir Ahmad*, Derek Brownlee*, Patricia Ferguson*
S3M-1984 Scottish Cup (lodged on 27 May 2008) Dr Richard Simpson*, Gil Paterson*, Helen Eadie*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Bob Doris*, Mary Mulligan*

S3M-1984 Elaine Murray: Scottish Cup—That the Parliament congratulates Queen of the South and Rangers football clubs for an exciting Scottish Cup Final on 24 May 2008 and congratulates Rangers on its victory and Queens on its spirited performance, especially in the second half. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor, David Stewart, Karen Gillon, Joe FitzPatrick, Stuart McMillan, Bill Butler, Murdo Fraser, Andy Kerr, George Foulkes, John Lamont, Nanette Milne, Keith Brown, Bashir Ahmad, Derek Brownlee, Patricia Ferguson, Dr Richard Simpson, Gil Paterson, Helen Eadie, Malcolm Chisholm, Bob Doris, Mary Mulligan
